title-group.article-title: FOURIER-CHEBYSHEV COEFFICIENTS AND GAUSS-TURÁN QUADRATURE WITH CHEBYSHEV WEIGHT

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2003 ICMSEC, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: The main purpose of this paper is to derive an explicit expression for Fourier-Chebyshev coefficient ${A_{kn}}(f) = \frac{2}{\pi }\int_{ - 1}^1 {f(x)} {T_{kn}}(x)\frac{{dx}}{{\sqrt {1 - {x^2}} }},k,n\, \in \,{N_0}$, which is initiated by L. Gori and C.A. Micchelli.
